summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of React dashboard application. All core functionalities working correctly including navigation, metrics display, report management, charts rendering, modal interactions, search/pagination, and localStorage persistence.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads with navbar showing 'Dashboard' title
4 metric cards displayed correctly: Last 7 Days progress, Open Alerts, Closing Rate %, Oldest Unacknowledged Alert
Report list panel shows 'Select Report Dashboard' title with search input and Add button
Pre-populated reports list with working pagination (Page 1 of 2)
Report selection highlights selected item and updates metrics + charts
Search functionality works for filtering reports
Add button opens modal with Title and Subtitle fields
Modal validation shows error messages when fields are empty
Modal submits successfully with valid data and adds new report to list
Bar chart 'Best Unit Operations with Latest Number of Alerts' renders correctly
Donut chart 'Alert Rates Distribution' renders correctly
LocalStorage persists reports data across page refresh
